Pull in sys-kernel package to install armbian kernel for this board

pkgmetadata.longdescription: u-boot bootloader firmware, with re-flash instructions for the selected rockchip sbc These were built with armbian/build -- ./compile.sh u-boot-config BOARD=xxxx etc. ./compile.sh u-boot BOARD=xxxx etc. Optionally pull in sys-kernel package to install armbian kernel and overlays for the selected rockchip sbc These were built with armbian/build -- ./compile.sh kernel-config BOARD=xxxx etc. ./compile.sh kernel BOARD=xxxx etc.
